title: Scruffles

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bark at a player, nullifying their ability tonight but forcing them to visit you tomorrow tonight.
- Bark encouragingly at an ally, allowing them to take two actions the next night. (Costs 3 affection points)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each time you're visited, you gain an affection point.
- If you have less than 3 affection points, you may still pre-emptively bark encouragingly if you believe you'll gain enough affection points to fulfill the requirement.
- *"C'mon, he's so cute! How could you \*not\* let Scruffles in?" ... "You already named it?"*
